about_the_game:
Sonority - Official Game Soundtrack

Once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory.

The official game soundtrack to Sonority features 24 tracks, all composed by Willi Schorrig.

Contributing Arists:
Ralf Neubauer
Rhiannon Moushall
Andrew James Spooner

To access the Soundtrack from Steam: select 'Sonority' -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Sonority - Original Soundtrack'
